original_title: Lady Baffles and Detective Duck in Baffles Aids Cupid
overview: Banker Shultz has not had a vacation for over thirty years. His doctor advises a rest or a breakdown will soon result. But it is impossible for Shultz to leave the affairs of the bank a moment. At last he hits on a great scheme. That of getting his friend, Detective Duck, to impersonate him.
title: Lady Baffles and Detective Duck in Baffles Aids Cupid
